nodes.text: Moogan Spice Syrup was a type of syrup that shared its name with the Moogan species of the planet Mooga and was used in the brewing of Moogan tea. The tea became known as Ardees Beverage once it began to be produced by the Ardees Beverage Company, a manufacturing plant owned by the Commerce Guild. The guild's recipe for the syrup was not kept secret, but the company sent cease and desist transmissions to anyone who created homemade versions of the drink.

Despite the possible legal ramifications, the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs included his own personal twist on the syrup's recipe in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which he wrote some time after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY.

Moogan Spice Syrup was one of the recipes included in the 2019 Star Wars cook book, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe recipe uses vanilla extract, a cinnamon stick, brown sugar, granulated sugar, and water to create a syrup.
